scripts.dev: run-pty % npm run dev-be % npm run dev-fe % npm run dev-test-unit % npm run dev-css % zsh
scripts.dev-fe: export BASE_URL=$(./scripts/getSandboxUrl.sh) && export STAGE=beta && cd packages/frontend-elm && npm run dev
scripts.build-fe-dev: npm run clear-static && cd packages/frontend-elm && npm run build:dev && cp -R dist/ ../../static
scripts.build-fe-prod: npm run clear-static && cd packages/frontend-elm && npm run build:prod && cp -R dist/ ../../static
scripts.clean: git checkout main && git pull && npm ci
scripts.rebase: git stash && git checkout main && git pull && git checkout - && git rebase main && git stash apply
